fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Interrogate (Night): Determine target player's class if marked as a Heretic.
> - Can't target the starting King
- Ruthless Efficiency (Night, 3 Uses): Attack target player with an enchanted staff.
> - Unhealable.
> - Can't target the starting King

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Relentless Pursuit: Become death immune for 1 night if attacked, then lose this passive. Lose this passive when you achieve your objective.

fields.name: Objective:
fields.value: Live long enough to see all Heretics die.
